title: Higher Mastery Tiers
body:
Hey!

With most people settling into the champion mastery tiers, with a few level fives or more, and in less frequent cases, with high amounts of points on champions, are there planned increases to champ mastery caps?

If so, what are the kinds of rewards could we expect? I'm not asking for specific details, because that's pretty obvious why you couldn't tell me; just some vague ideas on what we could see in the future.

Cheers!

replies.body:
They were mentioning it a while ago, but with new preseason changes and the rollout of the [_new champ select_](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/na/site/2016-season-update/new-champ-select.html) and [loot system](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/na/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html), it will probably be a while.

Im pretty sure the loot system ties into your question as rewards are given based on mastering a champ and your end of game grades.

I believe the release of the loot system was intended to be released with lvls 6 and 7 but given it's preseason, anything could happen :)

Thing is the mastery/loot system isn't a priority in preseason, because if it goes into s6 unreleased or with some things that need fixing it doesn't affect ranked at all. SO you can probably expect it once they get all the s6 balance changes as ironed out as they're gonna get.
